entry.title: Some remarks on papers: math.DG/0211091, math.DG/0306187, math.CA/0312090
entry.summary: This is no longer available.

entry.title: Constant Mean Curvature n-noids with Platonic Symmetries
entry.summary: Constant Mean Curvature n-noids with Platonic Symmetries

entry.title: On contractible orbifolds
entry.summary: We prove that a contractible orbifold is a manifold.

entry.title: MÃ©canique quantique
entry.summary: This text aims to explains briefly the formalism of quantum mechanics to mathematicians.

entry.title: Closedness of the Space of AHE Metrics on 4-Manifolds
entry.summary: See comment above.
entry.arxiv:comment: Reworked and reorganized into new paper: see math.DG/0104171

entry.title: Singularities of special Lagrangian submanifolds
entry.summary: We survey what is known about singularities of special Lagrangian submanifolds (SL m-folds) in (almost) Calabi-Yau manifolds. The bulk of the paper summarizes the author's five papers math.DG/0211294, math.DG/0211295, math.DG/0302355, math.DG/0302356, math.DG/0303272 on SL m-folds X with isolated conical singularities. That is, near each singular point x, X is modelled on an SL cone C in C^m with isolated singularity at 0. We also discuss directions for future research, and give a list of open problems.
entry.arxiv:comment: 29 pages. To appear in "Different faces of Geometry", International Mathematical Series

entry.title: Topology of closed 1-forms and their critical points
entry.summary: In this paper I suggest an alternative approach (using generic flat bundles and higher Massey products) to a Lusternik-Schnirelman type theory for closed 1-forms (cf. also math.DG/9811113)

entry.title: A remark on renormalized volume and Euler characteristic for ACHE 4-manifolds
entry.summary: This note computes the "renormalized volume" and a renormalizedGauss-Bonnet-Chern formula for the Euler characteristic ofasymptotically complex hyperbolic Einstein (in short: ACHE)4-manifolds.
entry.arxiv:comment: revised version ; reference to math.DG/0404455 added

entry.title: On Konopelchenko's representation for surfaces in 4 dimensions
entry.summary: The purpose of this short note is to relate a representation formula due to the Author and P. Romon for Lagrangian surfaces (see math.DG/0009202) to a more general Weierstrass representation type formula found by Konopelchenko for surfaces in 4-dimensional space (see math.DG/9807129). Simplifications are pointed out.

entry.title: Direct image for multiplicative and relative K-theories from transgression of the families index theorem, part 3
entry.summary: This is the final part of the work started in math.DG/0611281 and math.DG/0703916. Here the question of double fibration ois adressed both for relative k-theory and free multiplicative K-theory. In the case of relative and ``nonfree'' multiplicative K-theory, the direct image is proved to be functorial for double submersions.

entry.title: Mixing Mathematics and Materials
entry.summary: Recent uses of differential geometry in materials science are reviewed here, in particular the September issue of the Phil. Trans. Royal Soc., entitled ``Curvature and chemical Structure.''

entry.title: Hofer's diameter and Lagrangian intersections
entry.summary: We prove that the group of Hamiltonian diffeomorphisms of the 2-sphere has infinite diameter with respect to Hofer's metric. Our approach is based on the theory of Lagrangian intersections.

entry.title: Cartan Spinor Bundles on Manifolds
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is the construction of spinor bundles of Cartan type over certain non-orientable manifolds.

entry.title: A four dimensional example of Ricci-flat metric admitting almost-KÃ¤hler non-KÃ¡hler structure
entry.summary: We construct an example of Ricci-flat almost-K\"ahler non-K\"ahler structure in four dimensions.

entry.title: Twistor spinors on Lorentzian symmetric spaces
entry.summary: We solve the twistor equation on all indecomposable Lorentzian symmetric spaces explicity.

entry.title: Invariant Currents on Limit Sets
entry.summary: We relate the L^2 cohomology of a complete hyperbolic manifold to the invariant currents on its limit set.

entry.title: Gunther's proof of Nash's isometric embedding theorem
entry.summary: An complete exposition of Matthias Gunther's elementary proof of Nash's isometric embedding theorem.

entry.title: Integrable geometry and Soliton equations in 2+1 dimensions
entry.summary: Some aspects of the connection between differential geometry and multidimensional soliton equations are discussed.

entry.title: Seiberg-Witten Invariants-An Expository Account
entry.summary: In this note, we give an exposition of the construction of Seiberg-Witten invariants.

entry.title: The Theorem of Kronheimer-Mrowka
entry.summary: This note is an exposition of the proof of Thom's conjecture by Kronheimer and Mrowka, using the new Seiberg-Witten invariants.

entry.title: Lorentzian worldlines and Schwarzian derivative
entry.summary: We relate in this note the classical Schwarzian derivative to the curvature of time-like curves in Lorentz surfaces of constant curvature.

entry.title: A Heat Kernel Lower Bound for Integral Ricci Curvature
entry.summary: In this note we give a heat kernel lower bound in term of integral Ricci curvature, extending Cheeger-Yau's estimate.

entry.title: Lusternik-Schnirelman theory for closed 1-forms
entry.summary: S.P.Novikov developed an analog of the Morse theory for closed 1-forms. In this paper I suggest an analog of the Lusternik - Schnirelman theory for closed 1-forms.

entry.title: Recent Developments on the Ricci Flow
entry.summary: This article reports recent developments of the research on Hamilton's Ricci flow and its applications.

entry.title: The symplectic form for the fiber bundles over a Riemann surface II
entry.summary: We obtain an explicit formula for the symplectic form over the double quotient with help of the Green function of a Riemann surface.

entry.title: A Survey on Nambu-Poisson Brackets
entry.summary: The paper provides a survey of known results on geometric aspects related to Nambu-Poisson brackets.

entry.title: Hodge theory and $A_{\infty}$ structures on cohomology
entry.summary: We use Hodge theory and a construction of Merkulov to construct $A_{\infty}$ structures on de Rham cohomology and Dolbeault cohomology.

entry.title: Soliton equations in 2+1 dimensions and Differential geometry of curves/surfaces
entry.summary: A connection between differential geometry and soliton equations is discussed

entry.title: Rational homotopy types of mirror manifolds
entry.summary: We explain how to relate the problem of finding a mirror manifold for a Calabi-Yau manifold to the problem of characterizing the rational homotopy types of closed K\"{a}hler manifolds.

entry.title: Asymptotic values of hyperbolic monopoles
entry.summary: We show that many hyperbolic monopoles can be distinguished from each other via their asymptotic values in contrast to the case of Euclidean monopoles.

entry.title: Homogeneous Hypersurfaces with Isotropy in Affine Four-space
entry.summary: We classify the non-degenerate homogeneous hypersurfaces in real and complex affine four-space whose symmetry group is at least four-dimensional.

entry.title: Cayley Hypersurfaces
entry.summary: We exhibit a family of homogeneous hypersurfaces in affine space, one in each dimension, generalising the Cayley surface.

entry.title: Analytic Topology of Groups, Actions, Strings and Varietes
entry.summary: This is a paper in Analytic Topology.

entry.title: The trace formula for transversally elliptic operators on Riemannian foliations
entry.summary: We prove a Duistermaat-Guillemin trace formula for transversally elliptic operators on a compact foliated manifold.

entry.title: On the functoriality of Lott's secondary analytic index
entry.summary: We verify that the formula of X. Ma for the analytic torsion form of an iterated fibration implies that Lott's secondary analytic index is functorial.

entry.title: A Constructive Demostration of the Uniqueness of the Christoffel Symbol
entry.summary: In this note we exhibit a constructive demonstration of the uniqueness of the Christoffel symbol.

entry.title: Geometria nieortodoksyjna
entry.summary: This is an introductory text to differential geometry (written in Polish) aimed for high-school students.

entry.title: The Geometry of Supergravity Torsion Constraints
entry.summary: This is an expository paper about the geometry of the torsion constraints in the superspace formulation of supergravity theories. It was prepared for the 2001 Park City Research Program in Supergeometry.

entry.title: The Morse index theorem for regular Lagrangian systems
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove a Morse index theorem for the index form of regular Lagrangian system with selfadjoint boundary condition.

entry.title: Structures geometriques
entry.summary: We study the notion of geometric structures for toposes: This generalizes the notion of (X,G) manifolds. We give some applications to algebraic geometry

entry.title: A remark on the symmetries of the Riemann curvature tensor
entry.summary: This is an elementary observation that the symmetry properties of the Riemann curvature tensor can be (efficiently) expressed as SL(2)-invariance.

entry.title: Subcritical Stein manifolds are split
entry.summary: It is shown that every subcritical Stein manifold is deformation equivalent to the product of a Stein manifold with $\C$.

entry.title: First neighbourhood of the diagonal, and geometric distributions
entry.summary: We describe the geometric notion of distribution in synthetic terms, utilizing the notion of "first neighbourhood of the diagonal" from algebraic geometry. We characterize involutive distributions in combinatorial terms.

entry.title: Eigenvalues and Holonomy
entry.summary: We estimate the eigenvalues of connection Laplacians in terms of the non-triviality of the holonomy.

entry.title: Free abelian covers, short loops, stable length, and systolic inequalities
entry.summary: Withdrawn by first author.

entry.title: The Topological Classification of Minimal Surfaces in R^3
entry.summary: We give a complete topological classification of minimal surfaces in Euclidian three-space.

entry.title: Nonnegatively curved metrics on S^2xR^2
entry.summary: We classify the complete metrics of nonnegative sectional curvature on M^2xR^2, where M^2 is any compact 2-manifold.

entry.title: A Survey of Hamilton's Program for the Ricci Flow on 3-manifolds
entry.summary: We give a brief survey of Hamilton's program for 3-manifolds as an approach toward Thurston's Geometrization Conjectre.

entry.title: The Ricci Flow on Complete Noncompact KÃ¤hler Manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper we survey the recent developments of the Ricci flows on complete noncompact K\"{a}hler manifolds and their applications in geometry.

entry.title: Relations Among Universal Equations For Gromov-Witten Invariants
entry.summary: In this paper, we study relations among known universal equations for Gromov-Witten invariants at genus 1 and 2.

entry.title: On Flat Connections Induced Over Covering Maps
entry.summary: Flat connections induced over covering maps are studied and the trivial ones among them are described. In the sequel, we deal with the resulting holonomy bundles.

entry.title: Complex anti-self-dual instantons and Cayley submanifolds
entry.summary: We describe a glueing construction for a certain self-dual reduction of the Yang-Mills equations in dimension 8.

entry.title: The Cauchy problem for Lie-minimal surfaces
entry.summary: In the present paper we study the Lie sphere geometry of Legendre surfaces by the method of moving frame and we prove an existence theorem for real-analytic Lie-minimal Legendre surfaces.

entry.title: Kahler, Poisson Geometry of CR Lie groups
entry.summary: In this paper we study left invariant CR structures on Lie groups which are compatible with geometric properties as Poisson and kahler properties.

entry.title: On the structure of Bol algebras
entry.summary: The fundamental ideas of the definition of solvable and semisimple Bol algebras are given and some related theorems

entry.title: Homogeneity rank of real representations of compact Lie groups
entry.summary: The main result of this paper is the classification of the real irreducible representations of compact Lie groups with vanishing homogeneity rank.

entry.title: Cellular harmonic maps which are not diffeomorphisms
entry.summary: We give examples of harmonic cellular maps between negatively curved manifolds which are not diffeomorphisms but are homotopic to diffeomorphisms.

entry.title: Describing the platycosms
entry.summary: We study in detail the closed flat Riemannian 3-manifolds.

entry.title: The first $L^2$-Betti number for classifying spaces of variations of Hodge structures
entry.summary: The first Betti number for a lattice in a classifying space for variations of Hodge structures vanishes.

entry.title: A note on para-quaternion manifolds
entry.summary: We show that a para-quaternion nearly Kahler manifold is necessarily a para-quaternion Kahler manifold

entry.title: Lp-cohomology of negatively curved manifolds
entry.summary: We compute the $L^p$-cohomology spaces of some negatively curved manifolds. We deal with two cases: manifolds with finite volume and sufficiently pinched negative curvature, and conformally compact manifolds.

entry.title: L2-cohomology of negatively curved Kaehler manifolds of finite volume
entry.summary: We compute the space of $L^2$ harmonic forms (outside the middle degrees) on negatively curved Kaehler manifolds of finite volume.

entry.title: Constant Mean Curvature Trinoids
entry.summary: This paper constructs a family of constant mean curvature immersions of the thrice-punctured Riemann sphere into Euclidean 3-space with asymptotically Delaunay ends via loop group methods.

entry.title: The structure of algebraic covariant derivative curvature tensors
entry.summary: We use the Nash embedding theorem to construct generators for the space of algebraic covariant derivative curvature tensors.

entry.title: Taut representations of compact simple Lie groups
entry.summary: In this paper we classify the reducible representations of compact simple Lie groups all of whose orbits are tautly embedded in Euclidean space with respect to Z_2 coefficients.

entry.title: Deformations of Semisimple Bihamiltonian Structures of Hydrodynamic Type
entry.summary: We classify in this paper infinitesimal quasitrivial deformations of semisimple bihamiltonian structures of hydrodynamic type.

entry.title: Lie algebroid analog of Courant algebroid theory
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by UCHINO.

entry.title: Curvature bounds via Ricci smoothing
entry.summary: We give a proof of the fact that the upper and the lower sectional curvature bounds of a complete manifold vary at a bounded rate under the Ricci flow.

entry.title: On the developability of subalgebroids
entry.summary: In this paper, the Almeida-Molino obstruction to developability of transversely complete foliations is extended to Lie groupoids.

entry.title: Biharmonic properties and conformal changes
entry.summary: We construct a new class of biharmonic maps, which are the critical points for the bienergy functional, by deforming conformally the codomain metric of harmonic Riemannian submersions such that they become nonharmonic but biharmonic.

entry.title: Eta-Einstein condition on twistor spaces of odd-dimensional Riemannian manifolds
entry.summary: In this note, we find the conditions on an odd-dimensional Riemannian manifolds under which its twistor space is eta-Einstein.

entry.title: Non-Euclidean Analysis
entry.summary: This paper deals with various topics in analysis on hyperbolic spaces. It surveys some recent progress in non-Euclidean Fourier Analysis and proves some new results for the geodesic Radon transform on hyperbolic spaces.

entry.title: Complete minimal hypersurfaces of $S^4$ with zero Gauss-Kronecker curvature
entry.summary: We investigate the structure of 3-dimensional complete minimal hypersurfaces in the unit sphere with Gauss-Kronecker curvature identically zero.

entry.title: On a generic defining function of projective motion in the rigid 6-dimensional h-spaces
entry.summary: In this note we find a generic defining function of projective motion in the 6-dimensional rigid h-space.

entry.title: Connective structure for principal gerbes
entry.summary: In this paper we generalize the notion of connective structure defined by Pierre Deligne to gerbes bounded by the automorphisms group of a principal bundle.

entry.title: Rigidity and Flexibility in Poisson Geometry
entry.summary: We discuss several rigidity and flexibility phenomena in the context of Poisson geometry.

entry.title: On the total absolute curvature of sphere eversions
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author, due to an error in Proposition 2.2.

entry.title: PHH harmonic submersions are stable
entry.summary: We prove that harmonic PHH submersions are (weakly) stable.
entry.arxiv:comment: 4 pages, supported by a NATO fellowship

entry.title: Stabilite de Faber-Krahn en courbure de Ricci positive
entry.summary: P. Berard and D. Meyer proved a Faber-Krahn inequality for domains in compact manifolds with positive Ricci curvature. We prove stability results for this inequality.

entry.title: A Lefschetz formula for higher rank
entry.summary: A general Lefschetz formula for the geodesic action on locally symmetric spaces is proven.

entry.title: A note on the holomorphic invariants of Tian-Zhu
entry.summary: In this paper, we compute the Tian-Zhu invariant on hypersurfaces of complex projective spaces.

entry.title: The Algebraic Theory of the Fundamental Germ
entry.summary: This paper introduces a notion of fundamental group appropriate for laminations.
entry.arxiv:comment: 27 pages, 1 figure, to be published in the Bulletin of the Brasilian Mathematical Society

entry.title: Manifolds with commuting Jacobi operators
entry.summary: We characterize Riemannian manifolds of constant sectional curvature in terms of commutation properties of their Jacobi operators.

entry.title: Four-dimensional Osserman metrics with nondiagonalizable Jacobi operators
entry.summary: A complete description of Osserman four-manifolds whose Jacobi operators have a nonzero double root of the minimal polynomial is given.

entry.title: Prescribing the scalar curvature in the null case
entry.summary: We give a proof of the Kazdan-Warner conjecture concerning the prescribed scalar curvature problem in the null case.

entry.title: A convergence result of the Lagrangian mean curvature flow
entry.summary: We prove the mean curvature flow of the graph of a symplectomorphism between Riemann surfaces converges smoothly as time approaches infinity.

entry.title: The structure of CR manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper we study the topology of pseudo convex CR manifolds whose Reeb flow preserves the Levi metric.

entry.title: Instantons: topological aspects
entry.summary: Short survey to be published at the Encyclopedia of Mathematical Physics.

entry.title: The geometry of contact metric three manifolds
entry.summary: Determining the associated metrics we get a local classification of contact metric three manifolds.

entry.title: Riemann extensions in theory of the first order systems of differential equations
entry.summary: The properties of the Riemann extensions of nonriemannian spaces defined by the first order systems of differential equations are considered.

entry.title: On the fundamental group of some open manifolds
entry.summary: We study fundamental groups of non compact Riemannian manifolds. We find conditions which ensure that the fundamental group is trivial, finite or finitely generated.

entry.title: A short survey on biharmonic maps between Riemannian manifolds
entry.summary: In this short survey we report on the theory of biharmonic maps between Riemannian manifolds.

entry.title: The Poncelet grid and the billiard in an ellipse
entry.summary: We deduce a recent theorem by R. Schwartz on the structure of the so-called Poncelet grid from complete integrability of the billiard in an ellipse

entry.title: Compact spacelike surfaces in the 3-dimensional de Sitter space
entry.summary: We state several sufficient conditions for compact spacelike surface in the3-dimensional de Sitter space to be totally geodesic or spherical.

entry.title: Levi-Civita connections of flag manifolds
entry.summary: For any flag manifold G/T we obtain an explicit expression of its Levi-Civita connection with respect to any invariant Riemannian metric.

entry.title: On the singularity of Quillen metrics
entry.summary: We study the singularity of Quillen metrics for one-parameter degenerations of compact Kaehler manifolds.

entry.title: A higher dimensional generalization of taut foliations
entry.summary: A higher dimensional generalization of taut foliations is introduced. Tools from symplectic geometry are used to describe surgery constructions, and to study the space of leaves of this class of foliations.

entry.title: An intrinsic proof of Gromoll-Grove diameter rigidity theorem
entry.summary: We will present a new proof of the Gromoll-Grove diameter rigidity theorem.

entry.title: Quaternionic-contact hypersurfaces
entry.summary: We prove that every quaternionic-contact structure can be embedded in a quaternionic manifold and define a second fundamental form for a such embedding.

entry.title: Jacobi fields of the Tanaka-Webster connection on Sasakian manifolds
entry.summary: We build a variational theory of geodesics of the Tanaka-Webster connection on a strictly pseudoconvex CR manifold.

entry.title: On the pseudohermitian sectional curvature of a strictly pseudoconvex CR manifold
entry.summary: We study the pseudohermitian sectional curvature of a CR manifold.

entry.title: The Lichnerowicz theorem on CR manifolds
entry.summary: We obtain a Bochner type formula and an estimate from below on the spectrum of the sublaplacian of a compact strictly pseudoconvex CR manifold.

entry.title: Lightlike foliations of semi-Riemannian manifolds
entry.summary: Using screen distributions and lightlike transversal vector bundles we develop a theory of degenerate foliations of semi-Riemannian manifolds.

entry.title: Indefinite locally conformal Kaehler manifolds
entry.summary: We study the basic geometric properties of an indefinite locally conformal Kaehler manifold.

entry.title: A closed symplectic four-manifold has almost Kaehler metrics of negative scalar curvature
entry.summary: We show that every closed symplectic four-dimensional manifold admits compatible almost Kaehler metrics of negative scalar curvature.

entry.title: Construction of conjugate functions
entry.summary:
We find all pairs of real analytic functions $f$ and $g$ in $ bR^n$ such that $|
abla f|=|
abla g|$ and $(
abla f)(
abla g)=0$.

entry.title: A duality theorem for Riemannian foliations in nonnegative sectional curvature
entry.summary: Using a new type of Jacobi field estimate we will prove a duality theorem for singular Riemannian foliations in complete manifolds of nonnegative sectional curvature.

entry.title: Spectrum Generating on Twistor Bundle
entry.summary: We give explicit formulas for the intertwinors of all orders on the twistor bundle over $S^1\times S^{n-1}$ using spectrum generating technique introduced in \cite{BOO:96}.

entry.title: Sub-Riemannian Calculus on Hypersurfaces in Carnot Groups
entry.summary: We develope basic geometric quantities and properties of hypersurfaces in Carnot groups.

entry.title: Effondrements et petites valeurs propres des formes diffÃ©rentielles
entry.summary: Short survey about small eigenvalues of the Hodge Laplacian under bounded curvature collapsing.

entry.title: A Note on Characteristic Classes
entry.summary: This paper studies the relationship between the sections and the Chern or Pontrjagin classes of a vector bundle by the theory of connection. Our results are natural generalizations of the Gauss-Bonnet Theorem.

entry.title: Complete KÃ¤hler manifolds with pinched bisectional curvature
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author due to a serious gap in the proof of the main theorem.

entry.title: The adjoint variety of SL_{m+1}(C) is rigid to order three
entry.summary: I show that the adjoint variety of the complex special linear group is rigid to order three.

entry.title: Conformal geometry and fully nonlinear equations
entry.summary: This article is a survey of results involving conformal deformation of Riemannian metrics and fully nonlinear equations.
entry.arxiv:comment: 20 pages; to appear in World Scientific Memorial Volume for S.S. Chern

entry.title: Local Volume Estimate for Manifolds with $L^2$-bounded Curvature
entry.summary: We obtain a local volume growth for complete, noncompact Riemannian manifolds with small integral bounds and with Bach tensor having finite $L^2$ norm in dimension 4.

entry.title: Regularity properties of the degenerate Monge--AmpÃ¨re equations compact KÃ¤hler manifolds
entry.summary: We prove a regularity result for the Monge--Amp\`ere equations on compact Kaehler manifolds with degenerate rhs member.

entry.title: On Hamiltonian-Minimal Lagrangian Tori in CP^2
entry.summary: We obtain some equations for Hamiltonian-minimal Lagrangian surfaces in CP^2 and give their particular solutions in the case of tori.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Siberian Mathematical Journal, Vol. 44, N. 6, 2003, P. 1039-1042

entry.title: Symplectic virtual localization of Gromov-Witten invariants
entry.summary: We show that moduli spaces of stable maps admits virtual orbifold structure. The symplectic version of virtual localization formula is obtained.

entry.title: The Symplectization Functor
entry.summary: We describe a symplectization functor from the Poisson category to the symplectic "category" and we study some of its properties.
entry.arxiv:comment: Contribution for XV WGP, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife

entry.title: Manifolds with A Lower Ricci Curvature Bound
entry.summary: This paper is a survey on the structure of manifolds with a lower Ricci curvature bound.

entry.title: Extremal metrics on toric surfaces, I
entry.summary: The paper develops a continiuty method for solutions of the Abreu equation, which include extremal metrics on toric surfaces. Results are obtained, assuming a hypothesis (the "M-condition") on the solutions.

entry.title: Non-negatively curved metrics on $S^2\times S^2$ admitting Killing fields
entry.summary: %auto-ignore This paper has been withdrawn by the author, due to a crucial error.

entry.title: Some geometric calculations on Wasserstein space
entry.summary: We compute the Riemannian connection and curvature for the Wasserstein space of a smooth compact Riemannian manifold.

entry.title: Examples of Riemannian Manifolds with non-negative sectional curvature
entry.summary: An updated version with a few corrections.

entry.title: Une version feuilletÃ©e d'un thÃ©orÃ¨me de Bogomolov
entry.summary: On compact K\"{a}hler manifolds, we classify regular holomorphic foliations of codimension 1 whose canonical bundle is numerically trivial.

entry.title: Bernstein Theorems for Space-like Graphs with Parallel Mean Curvature and Controlled Growth
entry.summary: In this paper, we obtain an Ecker-Huisken type result for entire graphs with parallel mean curvature.

entry.title: On the Ricci curvature of normal metrics on Biquotients
entry.summary: We show that any normal metric on a closed biquotient with finite fundamental group has positive Ricci curvature.

entry.title: Klein geometries and stable nonlinear Spencer sequence
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the authors
entry.arxiv:comment: This paper has been withdrawn by the authors

entry.title: Curvature of hyperkaehler quotients
entry.summary: We prove estimates for the sectional curvature of hyperkaehler quotients and give applications to moduli spaces of solutions to Nahm's equations and Hitchin's equations.

entry.title: L^2 harmonics forms on non compact manifolds
entry.summary: The source of these notes is a series of lectures given at the CIMPA's summer school "Recent Topics in Geometric Analysis".

entry.title: A new proof of the Beez-Cartan theorem
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn by the author.

entry.title: Weil-Petersson Metric Geometry Quick Overview
entry.summary: A quick overview is provided on the current development of the WP metric geometry.

entry.title: Another property of minimal surfaces in Euclidean space
entry.summary: The new property of minimal surfaces is obtained in this article.

entry.title: New Examples of Biharmonic Submanifolds in $CP^n$ and $S^{2n+1}$
entry.summary: We construct biharmonic real hypersurfaces and Lagrangian submanifolds of Clifford torus type in $CP^n$ via the Hopf fibration; and get new examples of biharmonic submanifolds in $S^{2n+1}$ as byproducts .

entry.title: Extremal functions for the sharp $L^2-$ Nash inequality
entry.summary: We give geometrical conditions under which there exist extremal functions for the sharp $L^2$-Nash inequality.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Calculus of Variations and Partial Differential Equations 22, No 1 (2005) p 21-44

entry.title: The analog of the Schauder inequality for closed surfaces in Euclidean spaces
entry.summary: The analog of the Schauder inequality for closed surfaces in Euclidean spaces is obtained in this article.

entry.title: A symmetric Finsler space with Chern connection
entry.summary: We define a symmetry for a Finsler space with Chern connection and investigate its implementation and properties and find a relation between them and flag curvature.

entry.title: Manifolds with Pointwise Ricci Pinched Curvature
entry.summary: In this paper, we proved a compactness result about Riemannian manifolds with an arbitrary pointwisely pinched Ricci curvature tensor.

entry.title: Self-dual polygons and self-dual curves
entry.summary: We study projectively self-dual polygons and curves in the projective plane. Our results provide a partial answer to problem No 1994-17 in the book of Arnold's problems.

entry.title: Nonnegatively and Positively curved manifolds
entry.summary: This is a survey written for a special edition of the journal of differential geometry.

entry.title: On the type of triangle groups
entry.summary: We prove a conjecture of R. Schwartz about the type of some complex hyperbolic triangle groups.

entry.title: On the ground state of quantum layers
entry.summary: We provide some new results of the ground state of quantum layers.

entry.title: Counterexample to a geodesic length conjecture on the 2-sphere
entry.summary: Paper withdrawn by the author.

entry.title: The logarithmic Sobolev inequality along the Ricci flow in dimension 2
entry.summary: In this paper we present our results on the logarithmic Sobolev inequality along the Ricci flow in dimension 2.

entry.title: On the DDVV Conjecture and the Comass in Calibrated Geometry (II)
entry.summary: In this paper, we proved P(n,3), which is an important part of the DDVV conjecture. The general case will be treated in the next version of the paper.

entry.title: Continuation unique a partir de l'infini conforme pour les metriques d'Einstein
entry.summary: We prove the unique continuation property at the conformal infinity for asymptotically hyperbolic Einstein metrics.

entry.title: Local rigidity of surfaces in space forms
entry.summary: This paper is withdrawn.

entry.title: On the Gauss Map with Vanishing Biharmonic stress-energy tensor
entry.summary: We study the biharmonic stress-energy tensor $S_2$ of Gauss map. Adding few assumptions, the Gauss map with vanishing $S_2$ would be harmonic.

entry.title: Area-expanding embeddings of rectangles
entry.summary: We estimate whether there is an embedding from one n-dimensional rectangle into another which expands every k-dimensional area. Our estimate is sharp up to a constant factor in each dimension.

entry.title: On three dimensional conformally flat almost cosymplectic manifolds
entry.summary: In the paper there are described new examples of conformally flat three dimensional almost cosymplectic manifolds. All these manifolds form a class which was completely characterized.

entry.title: The Levy-Gromov Isoperimetric Inequality in Convex Manifolds with Boundary
entry.summary: We observe after Bayle and Rosales that the Levy-Gromov isoperimetric inequality generalizes to convex manifolds with boundary.

entry.title: A classification of spherical symmetric CR manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper we classify the simply connected, spherical pseudohermitian manifolds whose Webster metric is CR-symmetric.

entry.title: Proof of the normal scalar curvature conjecture
entry.summary: In this paper, we proved the normal scalar curvature conjecture and the Bottcher-Wenzel conjecture.

entry.title: A note on the Î±-invariant of the Mukai-Umemura 3-fold
entry.summary: We give an elementary argument to compute the $\alpha$-invariant of this Fano 3-fold, which implies the existence of a Kahler-Einstein metric.

entry.title: A Ricci nilsoliton is nongradient
entry.summary: In this brief note, we clarify that a Ricci nilsoliton cannot be of gradient type.

entry.title: Scalar Curvature Bound for KÃ¤hler-Ricci Flows over Minimal Manifolds of General Type
entry.summary: In this short note, we use classic computations for K\"ahler-Ricci flow to achieve scalar curvature bound for minimal manifold of general type.

entry.title: A Modified KÃ¤hler-Ricci Flow
entry.summary: In this note, a modified K\"ahler-Ricci flow is introduced and studied. The main point is to show the flexibility of K\"ahler-Ricci flow and summarize some useful techniques.

entry.title: On A-tensors in Riemannian geometry
entry.summary: We present examples, both compact and non-compact complete, of lo- cally non-homogeneous proper A-manifolds.

entry.title: Spherical Spectral Synthesis and Two-Radius Theorems on Damek-Ricci Spaces
entry.summary: We prove that spherical spectral analysis and synthesis hold in Damek-Ricci spaces and derive two-radius theorems.

entry.title: Convex Hypersurfaces in Hadamard Manifolds
entry.summary: We prove a theorem about an extremal property of Lobachevsky space among simply connected Riemannian manifolds of nonpositive curvature

entry.title: A sharp stability estimate in tensor tomography
entry.summary: We prove a sharp stability estimate for the problem of reconstructing a symmetric 2-tensor from its integrals along all maximal geodesics on a simple manifold.

entry.title: Spectral data for Hamiltonian-minimal Lagrangian tori in $CP^2$
entry.summary: In this work, we find spectral data that allow to find Hamiltonian-minimal Lagrangian tori in $CP^2$ in terms of theta functions of spectral curves.

entry.title: Constant scalar curvature metrics on toric surfaces
entry.summary: This paper completes a programme to determine which toric surfaces admit Kahler metrics of constant scalar curvature/

entry.title: On the Holonomy of Kaluza-Klein metrics
entry.summary: We investigate Kaluza-Klein metrics with a recurrent light-like vector field over a pseudo-Riemannian manifold.

entry.title: The Donaldson-Thomas instantons on compact Kahler threefolds and a convergence
entry.summary: The contents of this article are now presented in the appendix of arXiv:0805.2195v2.

entry.title: On the moduli space of negatively curved metrics of a hyperbolic manifold
entry.summary: We study the moduli space of negatively curved metrics of a hyperbolic manifold.

entry.title: Riemannian manifolds with geometric structures
entry.summary: Some geometric structures with associated Riemannian metrics have been considered in the book.

entry.title: Stokes Theorem for Lipschitz forms on a smooth manifold
entry.summary: Stokes theorem holds for Lipschitz forms on a smooth manifold.

entry.title: Almost Paracontact Manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper eleven basic classes of almost paracontact manifolds are introduced and some examples are constructed.

entry.title: The doubly periodic Scherk-Costa surfaces
entry.summary: We present a new family of embedded doubly periodic minimal surfaces, of which the symmetry group does not coincide with any other example known before.

entry.title: A K-theoretic L2-index theorem for families
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn due to a error in Theorem 3.1.

entry.title: Relative Yamabe invariant and c-concordant metrics
entry.summary: We show a surgery formula for the relative Yamabe invariant and give applications to the study of concordance classes of metrics.

entry.title: Biharmonic space-like hypersurfaces in pseudo-Riemannian space
entry.summary: We classify the space-like biharmonic surfaces in 3-dimension pseudo-Riemannian space form, and construct explicit examples of proper biharmonic hypersurfaces in general ADS space.

entry.title: Bianchi-BÃ¤cklund transforms and dressing actions, revisited
entry.summary: We characterize Bianchi-B\"{a}cklund transformations of surfaces of positive constant Gauss curvature in terms of dressing actions of the simplest type on the space of harmonic maps.

entry.title: Survey on Affine Spheres
entry.summary: We give a survey of the theory of affine spheres, emphasizing the convex cases and relationsships to Monge-Ampere equations and geometric structures on manifolds.

entry.title: Submanifolds with Biharmonic Gauss Map
entry.summary: We generalize the Ruh-Vilms problem by characterizing the submanifolds in Euclidean spaces with proper biharmonic Gauss map and we construct examples of such hypersurfaces.

entry.title: Sub-Riemannian calculus and monotonicity of the perimeter for graphical strips
entry.summary: We prove a monotonicity result at specific points for the Horizontal Perimeter for a class of surfaces in the Heisenberg group.

entry.title: Remarques sur les spineurs de Killing transversaux
entry.summary: We show necessary conditions for the existence of transversal Killing spinors on a spin manifold endowed with a Riemannian flow.

entry.title: The Total Gauss Curvature of a Three-Manifold Immersed in r 4
entry.summary: This paper has been removed. It is already a well known result.

entry.title: Vector bundles on Sasakian manifolds
entry.summary: We investigate the analog of holomorphic vector bundles in the context of Sasakian manifolds.

entry.title: A geometric proof of the classification of complex vector cross product
entry.summary: In this article, we give a geometric proof of the classification of complex vector cross product due to Lee-Leung.

entry.title: Tori Embedded in S3 with Dense Asymptotic Lines
entry.summary: In this paper are given examples of tori T^2 embedded in S^3 with all their asymptotic lines dense.

entry.title: Alexey Vasilyevich Pogorelov, the mathematician of an incredible power
entry.summary: Life and the mathematical legacy of the great mathematician A.V. Pogorelov.

entry.title: Hyperbolic structures on closed spacelike manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the intrinsic mean curvature flow on certain closed spacelike manifolds, and prove the existence of hyperbolic structures on them.

entry.title: Parabolic foliations on 3-manifolds
entry.summary: In the paper we prove that every closed orientable three-manifold admits a parabolic foliation.

entry.title: Homogeneous Lagrangian submanifolds of positive Euler characteristic
entry.summary: We fully classify all Lagrangian submanifolds of a complex Grassmannian which are an orbit of a compact group of isometries and have positive Euler characteristic.

entry.title: Feedback Differential Invariants
entry.summary: The problem of feedback equivalence for control systems is considered. An algebra of differential invariants and criteria for the feedback equivalence for regular control systems are found.

entry.title: ParaSasakian manifolds with a constant paraholomorphic section curvature
entry.summary: In this paper paraSasakian manifolds with a constant paraholomorphic section curvature are considered.

entry.title: On a class of linearizable planar geodesic webs
entry.summary: We present a complete description of a class of linearizable planar geodesic webs which contain a parallelizable 3-subweb.

entry.title: On the extrinsic geometry of contact structures
entry.summary: In the paper we prove, that extrinsic curvature does not impose restrictions on the topology of a contact structure, except the obvious ones.

entry.title: The second variation of the Ricci expander entropy
entry.summary: We compute the second variation of the Ricci expander entropy and briefly discuss the linear stability of compact negative Einstein manifolds.

entry.title: Isoparametric hypersurfaces and their application to special geometries
entry.summary: Isoparametric hypersurfaces and their application to special geometries

entry.title: Multiply conjugate systems containing deformations of quadrics
entry.summary: We provide a generalization of Bianchi's triply conjugate systems containing a family of deformations of 2-dimensional quadrics together with its B\"{a}cklund transformation to higher dimensions.

entry.title: Complex Lie algebroids and ACH manifolds
entry.summary: We propose the definition of a Manifold with a complex Lie structure at infinity. The important class of ACH manifolds enters into this class.

entry.title: Boots-Strapping Argument for a $J$-Holomorphic Mapping on a Strongly Pseudo-Convex Manifold
entry.summary: For $J$-holomorphic mappings for a strongly pseudo-convex manifold, we prove elliptic regularity by the argument of boots-strapping.

entry.title: On the uniqueness of Sasaki-Einstein metrics
entry.summary: Let $S$ be a compact Sasakian manifold which does not admit non-trivial Hamiltonian holomorphic vector fields. If there exists an Einstein-Sasakian metric on $S$, then it is unique.

entry.title: Lower order eigenvalues of the biharmonic operator
entry.summary: This paper has been withdrawn since the results are not satisfied.

entry.title: Diffeomorphism type of 6-dimensional cohomogeneity one manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper we give a full diffeomorphism characterization of compact simply connected cohomogeneity one manifolds in dimension six.

entry.title: Invariant generators for generalized distributions
entry.summary: The existence of invariant generators for distributions satisfying a compatibility condition with the symmetry algebra is proved.

entry.title: Higher Order Connections
entry.summary: The purpose of this article is to present the theory of higher order connections on vector bundles from a viewpoint inspired by projective differential geometry.

entry.title: Structure des feuilletages kÃ¤hleriens en courbure semi-nÃ©gative
entry.summary: This paper is concerned with (transversally) K\"ahler foliations. We proved here that the holonomy pseudo-group's lie algebra is semi-simple unde negativity assumptions of the Ricci tensor.

entry.title: A note on generalized S-space-forms
entry.summary: It is shown that, in a generalized S-space-form, $F_{7}$ always equals $F_{8}$.

entry.title: Greatest lower bounds on Ricci curvature for toric Fano manifolds
entry.summary: In this short note, based on the work of Wang-Zhu, we determine the greatest lower bounds on Ricci curvature for all toric Fano manifolds.

entry.title: Generalized asymptotic expansions of Tian-Yau-Zelditch (Announcements)
entry.summary: This an announcement for the generalized asymptotic expansion of Tian-Yau-Zeldtich.

entry.title: Intersection theory for ergodic solenoids
entry.summary: We develop the intersection theory associated to immersed, oriented and mea- sured solenoids, which were introduced in arXiv:0910.2836.

entry.title: Submanifolds with harmonic mean curvature vector field in contact 3-manifolds
entry.summary: Biharmonic or polyharmonic curves and surfaces in 3-dimensional contact manifolds are investigated.

entry.title: On the Jacobian of minimal graphs in R^4
entry.summary: We provide a characterization for complex analytic curves among two-dimensional minimal graphs in $\mathbb{R}^{4}$ via the Jacobian

entry.title: Samuelson's webs of maximum rank
entry.summary: The authors found necessary and sufficient conditions for Samuelson's web to be of maximum rank.

entry.title: A mass for asymptotically complex hyperbolic manifolds
entry.summary: We prove a positive mass theorem for complete K\"ahler manifolds that are asymptotic to the complex hyperbolic space.

entry.title: Relative K-stability of extremal metrics
entry.summary: We show that if a polarised manifold admits an extremal metric then it is K-polystable relative to a maximal torus of automorphisms.

entry.title: Affine images of Riemannian manifolds
entry.summary: We describe all affine maps from a Riemannian manifold to a metric space and all possible image spaces.

entry.title: Prequantization of logsymplectic structures
entry.summary: In this paper, we study quatization condition of logsymplectic struc- ture using integrality of such structue on the complement of associated divisor D.

entry.title: Four-dimensional conformal flat QK3-manifolds
entry.summary: A classification theorem for 4-dimensional conformally flat QK3-manifolds is proved.
entry.arxiv:journal_ref: Comptes rendus de l'Academie bulgare des Sciences, Tome 36, No 10, 1983, 1289-1290

entry.title: Conformal flat AK2-manifolds
entry.summary: A classification theorem for conformal flat AK2 manifolds is proved.

entry.title: On conformally flat totally real submanifolds
entry.summary: In Kaehler manifolds are investigated conformally flat totally real submanifolds, which are semiparallel or have semiparallel mean curvature vector.

entry.title: Analyse sur un demi-espace hyperbolique et poly-homogeneite locale
entry.summary: We prove local polyhomogeneity of asymptotically real or complex hyperbolic Einstein metrics, with application to unique continuation problems.

entry.title: Nonpostively curved Hermitian metric on product manifolds
entry.summary: In this article, we classify all the Hermitian metrics on a complex product manifold with nonpositive holomorphic bisectional curvature. It is a generalization of a result by Zheng.

entry.title: Globalizing locally compact local groups
entry.summary: Every locally compact local group is locally isomorphic to a topological group.

entry.title: Contou-Carrere symbol via iterated integrals and its reciprocity law
entry.summary: This paper gives a new definition of the Contou-Carrere symbol in terms of an exponential of a Chen iterated integral and proves the corresponding reciprocity law.

entry.title: On the existence of harmonic morphisms from three-dimensional Lie groups
entry.summary: In this paper we classify those three-dimensional Riemannian Lie groups which admit harmonic morphisms to surfaces.

entry.title: Holographic formula for $Q$-curvature. II
entry.summary: We extend the holographic formula for the critical $Q$-curvature to all $Q$-curvatures.

entry.title: An open four-manifold having no instanton
entry.summary: Taubes proved that all compact oriented four-manifolds admit non-flat instantons. We show that there exists a non-compact oriented four-manifold having no non-flat instanton.

entry.title: Expanding Ricci solitons with pinched Ricci curvature
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove that expanding gradient Ricci solitons with (positively) pinched Ricci curvature are trivial ones. Namely, they are either compact or flat.

entry.title: A minimal surface with unbounded curvature
entry.summary: We construct a complete, embedded minimal surface in euclidean 3-space which has unbounded Gaussian curvature. It has infinite genus, infinitely many catenoidal type ends and one limit end.

entry.title: Geometric realizations of affine Kaehler curvature models
entry.summary: We show that every Kaehler affine curvature model can be realized geometrically.

entry.title: Local index theorem for projective families
entry.summary: We give a superconnection proof of the cohomological form of Mathai-Melrose-Singer index theorem for the family of twisted Dirac operators under relaxed conditions.

entry.title: Stability, birational transformations and the Kahler-Einstein problem
entry.summary: We define a new notion of "b-stability" for a polarised algebraic variety, adapted to the existence problem for Kahler-Einstein metrics on Fano manifolds.

entry.title: A Generic Margulis Number for Hyperbolic 3-Manifolds
entry.summary: We show that 0.29 is a Margulis number for all but finitely many hyperbolic 3-manifolds. The finitely many exceptions are all closed.

entry.title: Curvature properties of Weyl geometries
entry.summary: We examine relations between geometry and the associated curvature decompositions in Weyl geometry.

entry.title: Bounded geometry, growth and topology
entry.summary: We characterize functions which are growth types of Riemannian manifolds of bounded geometry.

entry.title: Measure of curves in graded groups
entry.summary: We establish an area-type formula for the intrinsic spherical Hausdorff measure of every regular curve embedded in an arbitrary graded group.

entry.title: Contact Integrable Extensions of Symmetry Pseudo-Group and Coverings for the r-th Double Modified Dispersionless Kadomtsev--Petviashvili Equation
entry.summary: We find contact integrable extensions and coverings for the r-th double modified dispersionless Kadomtsev--Petviashvili equation.

entry.title: Recent progress on the Yamabe problem
entry.summary: We give a survey of various compactness and non-compactness results for the Yamabe equation. We also discuss a conjecture of Hamilton concerning the asymptotic behavior of the parabolic Yamabe flow.

entry.title: Bubbletons are not embedded
entry.summary: We discuss constant mean curvature bubbletons in Euclidean 3-space via dressing with simple factors, and prove that single bubbletons are not embedded.

entry.title: Structures de Weyl ALF
entry.summary: In this paper, we introduce the notions of ALF Weyl connection and of associated mass, and we prouve the positive mass theorem for the ALF Weyl structures.

entry.title: Minimal Surfaces in G2 Manifolds
entry.summary: We consider immersions of a Riemann surface into a manifold with $G_2$-holonomy and give criteria for them to be conformal and harmonic, in terms of an associated Gauss map.

entry.title: Inhomogeneous isoparametric hypersurfaces in complex hyperbolic spaces
entry.summary: We construct examples of inhomogeneous isoparametric real hypersurfaces in complex hyperbolic spaces.

entry.title: The Witten deformation for even dimensional conformally conic manifolds
entry.summary: The goal of this article is to generalise the Witten deformation to even dimensional conic manifolds and a class of functions called admissible Morse functions.

entry.title: A vanishing theorem in twisted de Rham cohomology
entry.summary: We prove a vanishing theorem for the twisted de Rham cohomology of a compact manifold.

entry.title: Compactifications of Complete Riemannian manifolds and Their Applications
entry.summary: To study a noncompact Riemannian manifold, it is often useful to find a compactification. We discuss several common compactifications and survey some recent results.

entry.title: Holomorphically pseudosymmetric Kahler metrics on CP^n
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to present examples of Kahler holomorphically pseudosymmetric metrics on the projective space CP^n.

entry.title: On Transverse Triangulations
entry.summary: We show that every smooth manifold admits a smooth triangulation transverse to a given smooth map. This removes the properness assumption on the smooth map used in an essential way in Scharlemann's construction [5].

entry.title: Hebey-Vaugon conjecture II
entry.summary: In this paper we consider the remaining cases of Hebey-Vaugon conjecture.

entry.title: Foliations on double-twisted products
entry.summary: In this paper we present a certain class of geodesic vector fields of the double-twisted product R X R. Some examples of totally geodesic foliations are given.

entry.title: A note on surfaces with parallel mean curvature
entry.summary: We use a Simons type equation in order to characterize complete non-minimal pmc surfaces with non-negative Gaussian curvature.

entry.title: Imaginary KÃ¤hlerian Killing spinors I
entry.summary: We describe and to some extent characterize a new family of K\"ahler spin manifolds admitting non-trivial imaginary K\"ahlerian Killing spinors.

entry.title: Uniform structures on differential spaces
entry.summary: The uniform structure on a differential space defined by a family of generators is considered.

entry.title: Parallel Mean Curvature Surfaces in Symmetric Spaces
entry.summary: We present a reduction of codimension theorem for surfaces with parallel mean curvature in symmetric spaces.

entry.title: A note on nonnegative curvature and (rational) homotopy type
entry.summary: We discuss a question by Felix, Oprea, and Tanre concerning nonnegative curvature and (rational) homotopy type.

entry.title: Causal Classification of Conformally Flat Lorentzian Cylinders
entry.summary: We derive all possible causality conditions for conformally flat Lorentzian metrics on the two-dimensional cylinder.

entry.title: Remarks on logarithmic K-stability
entry.summary: We make some observation on the logarithmic version of K-stability.

entry.title: An Elementary Remark on a Lower bound for the $Î¼$-Invariant of Singularity Models for Ricci Flow
entry.summary: Expository observation on the $\mu$-invariant of singularity models for Ricci Flow.

entry.title: Embedded constant curvature curves on convex surfaces
entry.summary: We prove the existence of embedded closed constant curvature curves on convex surfaces.

entry.title: Holomorphic Cartan geometries on uniruled surfaces
entry.summary: We classify holomorphic Cartan geometries on every compact complex curve, and on every compact complex surface which contains a rational curve.

entry.title: Calabi's inhomogeneous Einstein manifold is globally symplectomorphic to R^{2n}
entry.summary: We construct explicit global symplectic coordinates for the Calabi's inhomogeneous Kaehler-Einstein metric on tubular domains.

entry.title: Second variation of one-sided complete minimal surfaces
entry.summary: The stability and the index of complete one-sided minimal surfaces of certain three-dimensional Riemannian manifolds with positive scalar curvature are studied.

entry.title: Berezin quantization of homogeneous bounded domains
entry.summary: We prove that a homogeneous bounded domain admits a Berezin quantization.

entry.title: Curvature flow of complete convex hypersurfaces in hyperbolic space
entry.summary: We investigate the existence, convergence and uniqueness of modified general curvature flow of convex hypersurfaces in hyperbolic space with a prescribed asymptotic boundary.

entry.title: The Leibniz formula for the covariant derivative and some applications
entry.summary: A generalization of the classical Leibniz rule for the covariant derivative on a vector bundle is obtained.

entry.title: Evolution of spacelike surfaces in anti-De Sitter space by their Lagrangian angle
entry.summary: We study spacelike hypersurfaces in anti-De Sitter spacetime that evolve by the Lagrangian angle of their Gau\ss\ maps.

entry.title: Interior derivative estimates for the KÃ¤hler-Ricci flow
entry.summary: We give a maximum principle proof of interior derivative estimates for the K\"ahler-Ricci flow, assuming local uniform bounds on the metric.

entry.title: On smoothness of isometries between orbit spaces
entry.summary: We discuss the connection between the smooth and metric structure on quotient spaces, prove smoothness of isometries in special cases and discuss an application to a conjecture of Molino.

entry.title: Ricci Flow Equation on (Î±, Î²)-Metrics
entry.summary: In this paper, we study the class of Finsler metrics, namely (\alpha, \beta)- metrics, which satisfies the un-normal or normal Ricci flow equation.

entry.title: The curvature operator at the soul
entry.summary: We prove two splitting theorems, one topological, the other metric, for open manifolds with nonnegative sectional curvature.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear at Illinois Journal of Mathematics

entry.title: A note on equivariant eta forms
entry.summary: In this note, we prove the regularity of eta forms by the Clifford asymptotics. Then we generalize this result to the equivariant case.

entry.title: Weak limit of an immersed surface sequence with bounded Willmore functional
entry.summary: We will study the blowup behavior of a surface sequence immersed in $R^2$ with bounded Willmore functional and fixed genus.

entry.title: Riemannian Spin(7) holonomy manifold carries octonionic-Kahler structure
entry.summary: We prove that Riemannian $Spin(7)$ holonomy manifolds carry octonionic-K\"{a}hler structure.

entry.title: A new reconstruction method in integral geometry
entry.summary: A general method for analytic inversion of geometric integral transforms is proposed

entry.title: Ricci solitons on Sasakian manifolds
entry.summary: We show that a Sasakian metric which also satisfies the gradient Ricci soliton equation is necessarily Einstein.

entry.title: Theorems of Barth-Lefschetz type in Sasakian geometry
entry.summary: In this paper we obtain theorems of Barth-Lefschetz type in Sasakian geometry. As corollaries, this implis connectedness principle and Frankel's type theorem.

entry.title: Kropina spaces of constant curvature II (long version)
entry.summary: In this paper conditions for a Kropina structure to be of constant flag curvature are obtained.

entry.title: Tight holomorphic maps, a classification
entry.summary: We classify all tight holomorphic maps between Hermitian symmetric spaces of non-compact type.

entry.title: Horizontal cohomology of a local Lie group
entry.summary: We define and study the invariant linear and nonlinear horizontal double complexes of a local Lie group.

entry.title: Ricci Lower Bound for KÃ¤hler-Ricci Flow
entry.summary: In this note, we provide some general discussion on the Ricci lower bound along K\"ahler-Ricci flow with singularity over closed manifold.

entry.title: Pinched smooth hyperbolization
entry.summary: We discuss whether the strict hyperbolization process of Charney and Davis can be done smoothly.

entry.title: Indefinite symmetric spaces with $G_{2(2)}$-structure
entry.summary: We determine all indecomposable pseudo-Riemannian symmetric spaces of signature (4,3) whose holonomy is contained in $G_{2(2)}\subset SO(4,3)$.

entry.title: Algebraic Ricci solitons of four-dimensional pseudo-Riemannian generalized symmetric spaces
entry.summary: We completely classify the algebraic Ricci solitons of four-dimensional pseudo-Riemannian generalized symmetric spaces.

entry.title: Real hypersurfaces equipped with pseudo-parallel structure Jacobi operator in CP^2 and CH^2
entry.summary: We classify real hypersurfaces in CP^2and CH^2 equipped with pseudo-parallel structure Jacobi operator.

entry.title: Real Hypersurfaces in CP^2 AND CH^2 whose structure Jacobi operator is Lie D-parallel
entry.summary: We prove the non-existence of real hypersurfaces in CP^2 and CH^2 whose structure Jacobi operator is Lie D-parallel.

entry.title: The $Î·$-Einstein condition on indefinite s-manifolds
entry.summary: An $\eta$-Einstein condition is introduced in the context of indefinite g.f.f-manifolds, and a few Schur-type lemmas for indefinite S-manifolds are provided.

entry.title: Index and nullity of a family of harmonic tori in the sphere
entry.summary: In this note we investigate the $(E)$-index and the $(E)$-nullity of vacuum solutions from the two-torus into the two sphere.

entry.title: Juhl's Formulae for GJMS Operators and Q-Curvatures
entry.summary: Direct proofs are given of Juhl's formulae for GJMS operators and Q-curvatures starting from the original construction of GJMS.

entry.title: Extensions of the coeffective complex
entry.summary: The coeffective differential complex on a symplectic manifold is extended both in length and in scope, unifying the constructions of various other authors.

entry.title: Sharp lower bound on the curvatures of ASD connections over the cylinder
entry.summary: We prove a sharp lower bound on the curvatures of non-flat ASD connections over the cylinder.

entry.title: A note on RakiÄ duality principle for Osserman manifolds
entry.summary: In this note we prove that for a Riemannian manifold the Osserman pointwise condition is equivalent to the Raki\'c duality principle.

entry.title: Manifolds without conjugate points and their fundamental groups
entry.summary: We show that in the fundamental groups of closed manifolds without conjugate points centralizers of all elements virtually split.

entry.title: A Remark on Chern-Weil Theory
entry.summary: We show that Chern-Weil theory for tensor bundles over manifolds is a consequence of the existence of natural closed differential forms on total spaces of torsion free connections on frame bundles.

entry.title: Affine-geometric Wirtinger inequality
entry.summary: A generalization of the affine-geometric Wirtinger inequality for curves to hypersurfaces is given.

entry.title: A class of 3-dimensional contact metric manifolds
entry.summary: We classify the contact metric 3-manifolds that satisfy ||grad{\lambda}||=1 and \nabla_{{\xi}}{\tau}=2a{\tau}{\phi}.

entry.title: Gromov-Hausdorff limits of Kahler manifolds and algebraic geometry
entry.summary: We prove a general result about the geometry of holomorphic line bundles over Kahler manifolds.

entry.title: On the existence of Generalized Unicorns on Surfaces
entry.summary: This paper addresses the problem of existence of generalized Landsberg structures on surfaces using the Cartan-K\"ahler Theorem and a Path Geometry approach.

entry.title: Nil happens. What about Sol?
entry.summary: We construct complete, finite volume, 4-dimensional manifolds with sectional curvature $-1<K<0$ with cusp cross sections compact solvmanifolds.

entry.title: A double fibration transform for complex projective space
entry.summary: We develop some theory of double fibration transforms where the cycle space is a smooth manifold and apply it to complex projective space.

entry.title: The Finsler surface with K=0 and J=0
entry.summary: In this short note, we verify R. Bryant's claim: there does exist the singular Landsberg Finsler surface with a vanishing flag curvature which is not Berwaldian.

entry.title: From ALE to ALF gravitational instantons
entry.summary: We give an original analytic construction of hyperkahler ALF metrics on some ALE spaces of dihedral type, namely the spaces corresponding to minimal resolutions of Kleinian quotients relative to some binary dihedral group.

entry.title: Hyperbolic positive energy theorem with electromagnetic fields
entry.summary: We establish a type of positive energy theorem for asymptotically anti-de Sitter Einstein-Maxwell initial data sets by using Witten's spinoral techniques.

entry.title: The holomorphic symplectic structures on hyper-Kaehler manifolds of type A_{\infty}
entry.summary: We study the holomorphic symplectic structures on hyper-Kaehler manifolds of type A_{\infty}, by using the torus action.

entry.title: Integral geometric properties of non-compact harmonic spaces
entry.summary: We study integral geometric properties of non-compact harmonic spaces.

entry.title: Riemannian Manifolds with positive sectional curvature
entry.summary: This is a survey of recent results on manifolds with positive curvature from a series of lecture given in Guanajuato, Mexico in 2010. It also contains some hitsorical comments.

entry.title: Cohomologies of certain orbifolds
entry.summary: We study the Bott-Chern cohomology of complex orbifolds obtained as quotient of a compact complex manifold by a finite group of biholomorphisms.

entry.title: Notes on symmetric spaces
entry.summary: These are notes from a lecture course on symmetric spaces by the second author given at the University of Pittsburgh in the fall of 2010.

entry.title: Anharmonic Solutions of the Riccati equation and modular functions
entry.summary: We study algebraic solutions of the Riccati equation.

entry.title: On Ricci curvature and volume growth in dimension three
entry.summary: We prove that any complete metric on R^3 minus a ball with non-negative Ricci curvature and quadratic Ricci-curvature decay, has cubic volume growth.

entry.title: A splitting theorem on toric varieties
entry.summary: Using the short time existence of the Calabi flow, we prove that any extremal Kaehler metric on a product toric variety is a product extremal Kaehler metric.

entry.title: Scalar curvature behavior of homogeneous Ricci flows
entry.summary: We prove that the scalar curvature of a homogeneous Ricci flow solution blows up at a forward or backward finite-time singularity.

entry.title: On phi-recurrent generalized Sasakian-space-forms
entry.summary: We show that there is no phi-recurrent generalized Sasakian-space-forms, when is a non-zero constant.

entry.title: A detailed proof of a theorem of Aubin
entry.summary: In this note we give a detailed proof of a theorem of Aubin.

entry.title: An immersed $S^2$ self-shrinker
entry.summary: We construct an immersed and non-embedded $S^2$ self-shrinker.
entry.arxiv:comment: To appear in Transactions of the AMS

entry.title: Symbol calculus on a projective space
entry.summary: In this article, we introduce symbol calculus on a projective scheme. Using holomorphic Poisson structures, we construct deformations of ring structures for structure sheaves on projective spaces.

entry.title: The Gauss map for Lagrangean and isoclinic surfaces
entry.summary: Simple properties of the Gauss map characterise important classes of surfaces in $\Rq$: $R$-surfaces, the real version of plane complex curves; Lagrangean surfaces; isoclinic surfaces.

entry.title: Remark on the paper "Eigenvalues of the Witten-Laplacian on compact Riemannian manifolds" Q.-M. Cheng and L. Zeng [arXiv:1304.3212]
entry.summary: Why the results of that article [arXiv:1304.3212] are immediate consequences of known ones.

entry.title: About integrability of almost complex structures on strictly Nearly KÃ¤hler 6-manifolds
entry.summary: We show that any almost complex structure, positively tamed with $\omega$ on nearly K\"{a}hler 6-manifold $(M,g,J,\omega)$ is not integrable

entry.title: A Topological Approach to Unifying Compactifications of Symmetric Spaces
entry.summary: In this paper we present a topological way of building a compactification of a symmetric space from a compactification of a Weyl Chamber.

entry.title: Curves of Generalized AW(k)-type in Euclidean Spaces
entry.summary: In this study, we consider curves of generalized AW(k)-type of Euclidean n-space. We give curvature conditions of these kind of curves.

entry.title: Immersed self-shrinkers
entry.summary: We construct infinitely many complete, immersed self-shrinkers with rotational symmetry for each of the following topological types: the sphere, the plane, the cylinder, and the torus.

entry.title: Rigidity of causal maps
entry.summary: We show that order-invariant injective maps on the noncompactly causal symmetric space $SO_0 (1,n)/SO_0 (1,n-1)$ belong to $O(1,n)^+$.

entry.title: Energy of solenoidal vector fields on spherical domains
entry.summary: We present a boundary version of a theorem about solenoidal unit vector fields with minimum energy on a spherical domain of an odd dimensional Euclidean sphere.

entry.title: On the isoperimetric constant of symmetric spaces of noncompact type
entry.summary: We prove that the isoperimetric constant is positive for all symmetric spaces of noncompact type and compute it explicitly.

entry.title: Harmonic morphisms and eigenfamilies on the exceptional Lie group G2
entry.summary: We construct harmonic morphisms on the compact simple Lie group G2. The construction uses eigenfamilies in a representation theoretic scheme.

entry.title: On the asymptotic Plateau's problem for CMC hypersurfaces in hyperbolic space
entry.summary: It is extended a result due to B. Guan and J. Spruck on the asymptotic Plateau's problem for CMC radial graphs in hyperbolic space to horizontal CMC graphs.

entry.title: Isoparametric functions and harmonic unit vector fields in K-contact geometry
entry.summary: We provide some examples of harmonic unit vector fields as normalized gradients of isoparametric functions from a K-contact geometry setting.

entry.title: A note on inhomogeneous foliations with sections
entry.summary: We give an easy example showing that sections of a singular Riemannian foliation on a simply connected space neither have to be isometric nor injectively immersed.

entry.title: A Lichnerowicz vanishing theorem for proper cocompact actions
entry.summary: We establish a Lichnerowicz type vanishing theorem for non-compact spin manifolds admiting proper cocompact actions, when the action group is unimodular.

entry.title: Stability of pairs
entry.summary: This is essentially an expository note based on S. Paul's works on the stability of pairs. Its connection to K-stability will be also discussed.

entry.title: Non-collapsing for nearly spherical closed curves under power curvature flow
entry.summary: We show non-collapsing for the evolution of nearly spherical closed convex curves in \mathbb{R}^2 under power curvature flow using two-point-methods.

entry.title: A Poisson manifold of strong compact type
entry.summary: We sketch the construction of an integrable Poisson manifold whose canonical integration is compact

entry.title: On Jordan (Co)Algebras
entry.summary: We present new results about Jordan algebras and Jordan coalgebras, and we discuss about their connections with the Yang-Baxter equations.

entry.title: Topology of complete Finsler manifolds admitting convex functions
entry.summary: We study the topology of complete Finsler manifolds admitting convex functions

entry.title: Eigenvalues of the Tachibana Operator which Acts on Differential Forms
entry.summary: In the present paper we show spectral properties of a littleknown natural Riemannian second-order differential operator acting on differential forms.

entry.title: On the holonomy group of hypersurfaces
entry.summary: Hypersurfaces of manifolds of constant nonzero sectional curvature are classificated according their restricted homogeneous holonomy groups.

entry.title: r-Regularity
entry.summary: We provide a characterization of r-regular sets in terms of the Lipschitz regularity of normal vector fields to the boundary.

entry.title: Kahler surfaces with quasi-constant holomorphic curvature
entry.summary: The aim of this paper is to describe Kahler surfaces with quasi-constant holomorphic curvature

entry.title: Opening nodes on horosphere packings
entry.summary: We use Bryant Representation to construct constant mean curvature one surfaces in hyperbolic space that desingularize a horosphere packing.

entry.title: A geometric proof of the existence of definable Whitney stratifications
entry.summary: We give a geometric proof of existence of Whitney stratifications of definable sets in o-minimal structures.

entry.title: Berezin-EngliÅ¡' quantization of Cartan-Hartogs domains
entry.summary: We prove the existence of a Berezin-Engli\v{s} quantization for Cartan-Hartogs domains.
entry.arxiv:comment: 11 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1106.2510 by other authors

entry.title: Optimal geometric estimates for fractional Sobolev capacities
entry.summary: This note develops certain sharp inequalities relating the fractional Sobolev capacity of a set to its standard volume and fractional perimeter.

entry.title: The prescribed scalar curvature problem for metrics with unit total volume
entry.summary: We solve the modified Kazdan-Warner problem of finding metrics with prescribed scalar curvature and unit total volume.

entry.title: Critical Metrics for Riemannian Curvature Functionals
entry.summary: This article is based upon lectures given at the 2013 IAS/Park City Mathematics Institute summer program in geometric analysis.

entry.title: On complete Yamabe soliton
entry.summary: In this work, it is shown that a Riemannian complete shrinking Yamabe soliton has finite fundamental group and its first cohomology group vanishes.

entry.title: Hyperbolic thermostat and Hamilton's Harnack inequality for the Ricci flow
entry.summary: In this paper, we will recover Hamilton's Harnack inequality for the Ricci flow from the view point of Hyperbolic thermostat.

entry.title: A Gauss-Bonnet-Chern theorem for complex Finsler manifolds
entry.summary: In this paper, we establish a Gauss-Bonnet-Chern theorem for general closed complex Finsler manifolds.

entry.title: K-stability implies CM-stability
entry.summary: In this paper, we prove that any polarized K-stable manifold is CM-stable. This extends what I did for Fano manifolds in my 2012 paper.

entry.title: Submanifolds of a conformal Sasakian manifold
entry.summary: In the present paper first, we define the conformal Sasakian manifolds and then we study geometry of invariant, anti-invariant and CR-submanifolds of conformal Sasakian manifolds.

entry.title: Classification of generalized Wallach spaces
entry.summary: In this paper, we present the classification of generalized Wallach spaces and discuss some related problems.

entry.title: Curvature Estimates for Four-Dimensional Gradient Steady Ricci Solitons
entry.summary: In this paper, we derive certain curvature estimates for 4-dimensional gradient steady Ricci solitons either with positive Ricci curvature or with scalar curvature decay.

entry.title: Desingularization of branch points of minimal disks in $\mathbb{R}^4$
entry.summary: We deform a minimal disk in $\mathbb{R}^4$ with a branch point into symplectic minimally immersed disks with only transverse double points.

entry.title: Uniqueness of the stereographic embedding
entry.summary: The standard conformal compactification of Euclidean space is the round sphere. We use conformal geodesics to give an elementary proof that this is the only possible conformal compactification.

entry.title: Conical structure for shrinking Ricci solitons
entry.summary: For a shrinking Ricci soliton with Ricci curvature convergent to zero at infinity, it is proved that it must be asymptotically conical.

entry.title: Parallelism between locally conformal symplectic manifolds and contact manifolds
entry.summary: We give the parallelism between locally conformal symplectic manifolds and contact manifolds. We also give the generalization of exact contact manifolds.

entry.title: Seifert's conjecture for almost symplectic foliations
entry.summary: We disproving Seifert's conjecture for almost symplectic foliations with co-dimension bigger or equal to 3.

entry.title: A Bonnet theorem for submanifolds into rotational hypersurfaces
entry.summary: In this work, we prove a version of the fundamental theorem of submanifolds to target manifolds with warped structure.

entry.title: Regularization via Cheeger Deformations
entry.summary: We show that Cheeger deformations regularize $G$--invariant metrics in a very strong sense.

entry.title: Isoperimetric inequality along the twisted KÃ¤hler-Ricci flow
entry.summary: We prove a uniform isoperimetric inequality for all time along the twisted K\"{a}hler-Ricci flow on Fano manifolds.

entry.title: Calibrated submanifolds in neck manifolds
entry.summary: We find calibrated submanifolds in neck manifolds. Particularly, we obtain a calibrated submanifold in the Lagrangian self-expander constructed by Joyce, Lee and Tsui.

entry.title: Homogeneous $(Î±,Î²)$-spaces with positive flag curvature and vanishing S-curvature
entry.summary: We give a complete classification of homogeneous $(\alpha,\beta)$-metrics with positive flag curvature and vanishing S-curvature.

entry.title: Classification of isoparametric hypersurfaces in spheres with $(g,m)=(6,1)$
entry.summary: We classify isoparametric hypersurfaces in spheres with $(g,m)=(6,1)$ and thereby reprove a result of Dorfmeister and Neher.

entry.title: On Projectively Flat Spherically Symmetric Finsler Metrics
entry.summary: The class of spherically symmetric Finsler metrics is studied and locally dually flat and projectively flat spherically symmetric Finsler metrics is classified.
entry.arxiv:comment: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1302.3257 by other authors

entry.title: Around distance-squared mappings
entry.summary: This is a survey article on distance-squared mappings and related topics.

entry.title: The Bounded Spherical Functions on the Cartan motion group
entry.summary: The Bounded Spherical Functions are determined for a Cartan Motion Group

entry.title: On homogeneous composed Clifford foliations
entry.summary: We complete the classification, initiated by the second named author, of homogeneous singular Riemannian foliations of spheres that are lifts of foliations produced from Clifford systems.

entry.title: Tangent hyperplanes to subriemannian balls
entry.summary: We examine the existence of tangent hyperplanes to subriemannian balls. Strictly abnormal shortest paths are allowed

entry.title: A sectional curvature for statistical structures
entry.summary: A new type of sectional curvature is introduced. The notion is purely algebraic and can be located in linear algebra as well as in differential geometry.

entry.title: Algebraic nature of singular Riemannian foliations in spheres
entry.summary: We prove that singular Riemannian foliations in Euclidean spheres can be defined by polynomial equations.

entry.title: Semi-Helices of Euclidean Spaces
entry.summary: We introduce semi-helix hyper surfaces of Euclidean spaces. We also provide a local characterization of how these semi-helices are constructed.

entry.title: A remark on the convergence of inverse $Ï_k$-flow
entry.summary: We study the positivity of related cohomology classes concerning the convergence problem of inverse $\sigma_k$-flow in the conjecture proposed by Lejmi and Sz\'{e}kelyhidi.

entry.title: Compact 4-manifolds with harmonic Weyl tensor and nonnegative biorthogonal curvature
entry.summary: In this note we classify compact 4-manifolds with harmonic Weyl tensor and nonnegative biorthogonal curvature

entry.title: Homotopy Poisson-n Algebras from N-plectic Structures
entry.summary: We associate a homotopy Poisson-n algebra to any higher symplectic structure, which generalizes the common symplectic Poisson algebra of smooth functions. This provides robust n-plectic prequantum data for most approaches to quantization.

entry.title: On deformation of extremal metrics
entry.summary: We generalize the bifurcation technique of Bando-Mabuchi in the context of extremal metrics.

entry.title: Uniqueness of asymptotic cones of complete noncompact shrinking gradient Ricci solitons with Ricci curvature decay
entry.summary: We discuss an elementary consequence of the works of (1) Brett Kotschwar and Lu Wang and (2) Ovidiu Munteanu and Jiaping Wang.

entry.title: A discontinuous isoperimetric profile for a complete Riemannian manifold
entry.summary: The first known example of a complete Riemannian manifold whose isoperimetric profile is discontinuous is given.

entry.title: A bound for the order of the fundamental group of a complete noncompact Ricci shrinker
